column17:
Philips Electric Kettle allows you to boil only the water you need thus saving upto 50% of energy. It has hinged lid with large opening for easy filling and cleaning easy to read water level indicators on both side and a cord winder for easy storage. It also has four-way safety system andanti-calc filter for a clean cup of water. For easy lifting and placing it has cordless 360 degree pirouette base andflat heating element for fast boiling and easy cleaning.
